Review.Titre: Good service and fast response times.
Review.Contenu: Good service and fast response times.They helped figure things out pretty fastAwesome service Thanks

Review.Titre: I have nothing to complain about…
Review.Contenu: I have nothing to complain about actually.

Review.Titre: It is really fast but some services are…
Review.Contenu: It is really fast but some services are downgraded while using prestashop.

Review.Titre: I think the customer service was…
Review.Contenu: I think the customer service was excellent and the process was convenient and easy.

Review.Titre: I do not have any problem so far.

Review.Contenu: After subscribing to a second domain I experienced an email SMTP issue. Two on-line written requests for assistance through the Support portal were ignored. So, tried with the Support live chat. First chat was answered quickly but the issue (SMTP server) was not resolved. Second chat was answered after waiting about 20 minutes due to long queue. SMTP issue still not resolved. Both Support staff were very helpful but they could not identify the SMTP issue so I still have incorrectly functioning server (emails on my other domain using a different server work fine).

During the last weekend our school website stopped responding. The first email to inMotion hosting support was answered very promptly which got the ball rolling so that within a short period our website was up and running again. A simple issue thereafter was corrected almost immediately after the email request was sent. Emails received from InMotion Hosting were informative and explained the issues succinctly. David. Principal, Sefton School. NZ

Review.Titre: I have been using InMotion for years…
Review.Contenu: I have been using InMotion for years and have never had any problems that couldn't be fixed. When I have had an issue, usually because I can't figure out how to set something up, the support has always been great and often will take the initiative and things get resolved very quickly.

The technical assistance I received was excellent. The technician was very helpful and worked to resolve the issues I was experiencing. The only drawback was the que wait time. My wait time was 30-40 minutes, however, once I received service the technician took all the time needed to resolve my issues.

I was experiencing a problem with my site regularly timing out and the good folks on the tech support team helped provide a solution. They were quick to respond and continued the conversation as a solution was implemented. I am happy that I chose InMotion as my host. Highly recommended.

I had an issue with how I could get http across to a file for my website. Although the wait on Chat was a bit long, the service was excellent.In total, it took about 20 minutes but the support person knew what to do and I got the problem solved.

Review.Titre: They are a great deal for a good price
The customer service people at InMotion…
Review.Contenu: The customer service people at InMotion Hosting have always been helpful and courteous to me. They respond quickly and usually have the answers that I need. I also find the cPanel and other hosting management tools to be very easy to use.

Review.Titre: You were prompt and it went fine
Good company just liked others more
Review.Contenu: I used these guys for awhile then switched to oowdomains.com instead because I liked their setup better and their cheaper for hosting services. I had good experience with them though. Just preferred others more.

Review.Titre: Renewals need to be more transparent
Review.Contenu: There are separate prices for renewal v/s new sign-ups. For exactly the same plan with same features. It feels like being short-changed. Why the different treatment? Why should great discounts be only offered to the new sign-ups? One has to negotiate to get the best price while renewing. This seems very opaque and non user friendly practice. There should be one rate for one plan. Yes, of-course there can be channel promotions or other affiliate discounts, etc. however once someone signs-up with inmotionhosting, they should be offered the same price (with discounts) at renewal as being offered to a new sign-up. I would have rated 3, however the customer support is very helpful so it's +1 for them.It's not a perfect 5 because of company policy!

Review.Titre: Pretty good hosting, but they seem kind of slow and bit over priced
Review.Contenu: My experience with InMotion has been good, but my website does seem to load pretty slow, and it's a very simple website. Their customer service have been quite responsive, but I felt that they could have been a lot more clear with their instructions. I'm not very tech savvy though, and I don't know much about this kind of stuff so that's probably why I had to call them back a few times for the same question. I haven't really had a problem with their service other than it seems a bit slow, but I would recommend doing some research before you go with InMotion, especially if you're a newbie. I have a feeling that there could be better service out there for the same price if not cheaper.

Review.Titre: The fees are slightly higher than some…
Review.Contenu: The fees are slightly higher than some other providers, but overall I am happy with their support that they have. If the price goes up though, may consider joining another hosting provider.

Review.Titre: Customer Service is great with this…
Review.Contenu: Customer Service is great with this company. while for right now, some of the features are not working...the customer service has been so great...those things are minor in comparisons.
The online 24 hour customer support is great.  The only reason why I didn't provide a 5 star rating for Inmotionhosting, is that their site builder sucks.  Other than that, I'm very happy.

My first business transaction with IMH was on 3/3/2010 to purchase my domain name for my first website. My first computer purchase was in 1973 for our family auto parts business - a Triad Winchester drive system. My first hosting plan was purchase on 8/27/10 and I've been with them since. The quality of service has been almost always excellent. There have been some "technicians"  I've had to deal with that lack sufficient expertise and/or communication skills for my satisfaction. So, they're not perfect. Over the years, accessibility to sup[port has become more time-consuming and less 100% sure of resolution, particularly with the first contact. Nonetheless, I've yet to find any compelling reason to change. More than anything, I'm consistently surprised and the length support staff will go to help me (when they understand my problem and have some sense of how to fix it.) THAT's customer service, and THAT's what I'm really paying for.
Very pleased so far with services and support.  4 star is due to the price increase, otherwise, service has been great.
every thing is fine, but they need to upgrade the payment gate to accept all payment methods in global level.
Thanks www.inmotionhosting
Reviewed.  .
could be better, switched host, bad support

Review.Titre: Jesse O did a great job helping me today

Review.Contenu: Great support, good hosting plans.

Wanting to get away from companies owned by Newfold Digital (iPower, iPage, BlueHost & HostGator) IInMotion Hosting made it super easy to get an account started. With me being on a limited income, I was limited to what I could afford right away, this close to Christmas. Adam B gave me the hook-up with his personal discount for one year of service. I'll be able to plan ahead better and still save money over iPower. Plus having real support is crucial. That is something that InMotion Hosting has not forgotten, unlike iPower.
InMotion has been consistently there, 24/7,  when we’ve had any needs whatsoever, year after year.

Review.Titre: Trustworthy Company; Excellent and Personal Support
Review.Contenu: InMotion has been our host for several years now, through 2 versions of one site and a 2023 new site. They have been 100% reliable, technically current and supremely helpful to this small business.What we like best about them is their telephone support. These reps are such a life saver to our business, which does not have any in-house IT. They have been unfailingly helpful and understanding, not to mention very patient in their explanations to a non-tech type such as I.Price-wise they are reasonable, a big help during these  challenging times.We've looked at different provides a few times, but always come back to InMotion. We are big fans and definitely recommend them to anyone looking for an American host they can put their trust in.

Review.Titre: Happy with the service I receive
Review.Contenu: Switched my hosting a few years back, I've never had any issues. When I have needed to contact support, they have always been very helpful.

Review.Titre: Highly capable, knowledgeable, and helping support staff
Review.Contenu: The support staff is highly capable. They have knowledge and are eager to solve your problem. They never give vague answers; they solve your problem. If required, they also point you to accurate resources. In short, your problem is solved. Always!

I've gone through many hosts over the last 30 years, the last 6 or so years with InMotion. InMotion hosting is heads and tails better than all the rest. Support is amazing. I'd be hard pressed to even consider going elsewhere.

Over several years hosting with In-Motion, they have saved my bacon several times. Knowing that my internet skills have rusted out over time, I can count on them to help me "fix" what I need. They often will actually DO what they suggest I need to do. THAT is a real plus. When my emails got hacked for spam, they let me know and fixed it all with my OK. How Great is that?!! Nothing but good to say about their support group.

Excellent hosting solution and support. Switched from Bluehost ~6 months ago and could not be happier. Tech support is smart and actually helps solve problems. Unless you have big budgets for hosting can't go wrong with InMotion.

Review.Titre: No challenge too great for this talented support team.
Review.Contenu: We've been an enthusiastic client of InMotion Hosting for several years. Their product line provides a great choice, their prices fair, and their sales team is excellent. But from our point-of-view it is their support team that earns consistent 5-star ratings. Without exception, they are knowledgeable, dogged problem-solvers who act quickly and efficiently whenever their help is needed. They are courteous, professional, creative, and listen carefully even to tech-novice clients. And they always succeed regardless of the challenge presented. This most recent challenge was no exception. InMotion has earned our loyalty with their top support services.

Have been using this company for hosting for almost 10 years... a little more expensive than competitors, but totally worth it! The customer service is exceptional and they really go above and beyond – that alone is worth the few extra dollars every year.I also like that they are located in the U.S. ... cheaper companies are often offshore which can cause problems in the long run. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: The Tech Support person was great
Review.Contenu: The Tech Support person was great! He understood exactly what my problem was and fixed it. Excellent communications as well.

Tech support is always quickly available, consistently helpful, and without fail clear. They are there, they know their stuff, and they are able to address it and explain it in language that is understandable by a non-tech mind (like mine). Over decades, I have used several servers. InMotion is beyond excellent.

Review.Titre: InMotion did a great job of building and maintaining our site
Review.Contenu: InMotion did a great job of building our website and now keeps it up and running.  No hassles in site management or maintenance worries.  A one stop shop that just took care of everything.  This is the fourth year that InMotion has provided superior service and managed our internet site.

InMotion Hosting has supported me since day one! I started through third-party but when the developer dropped the ball; InMotion Hosting stepped in, explained everything I needed to do to take control and walked me through the process. Along with their training support, I can call at anytime and get the support that ensures my continued success! I am so impressed! Thank you for an wonderful experience!

Review.Titre: I been with InMotion for over a decade…
Review.Contenu: I been with InMotion for over a decade hosting my website. No problems at all, always very willing to solve and advise me well. I strongly recommend them if you want good service and peace of mind.

Review.Titre: A great support team and overall experience
Review.Contenu: When a technical or more likely a user error (mine) occurs the support team is both courteous and helps me through the issue in a timely and professional manner. I've been with InMotion Hosting for over 10 years and will be for as long as I require a website to be hosted. Great team, greater service

Been a customer for over 9 years and yes they are usually more expensive than the competition but their customer service is outstanding, never had an issue over the years that they didnt take care of, and we've had plenty believe me, from having our email ip blacklisted all the way to hacked websites and much more. And they have always delivered. So make no mistake they are great!

InMotion is not only very reasonably priced but their customer service is awesome! They are easy to speak with unlike some companies and they actually listen instead of jumping ahead of themselves when you call in with an issue! If you are on the fence about their services don't be!

We have been with InMotion for a number of years and the support has been fabulous.  I've been learning to manage a website and their support team have been very patient, kind and have recued me when I've made mistakes; like accidentally deleting the entire site.  The product options have been excellent too and the security, email client, etc have all been very easy to learn.  We ported from another company and our website couldn't come with us, but now if we ever had to do that again (which is highly unlikely) our website belongs to us.
This company has incredible documentation and support, paired with a 0 risk pricing plan, there stands very little reason not to try such a well put together wordpress hosting service

Very helpful and knowledgeable!Our SSL had expired, we had a new one, but were having issues installing it without a computer (phones can only do so much...) because we were out of town. InMotion was very, very, very helpful!!! They got the new SSL installed and we were back up and running in mere minutes. They saved us! Their technical group is top notch! Thank you!!!

Review.Titre: We requested help from the billing…
Review.Contenu: We requested help from the billing department because we made duplicated purchases on a new domain.The problem was solved by the help of your management.Very nice people and company

Review.Titre: The BEST Tech Support & Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I switched from Rackspace to InMotion Hosting over a decade ago. Started out with shared hosting and moved up through VPS accounts to a Dedicated Server. InMotion Hosting has amazing tech support and customer service. They made this journey less scary and quite easy.

I've been using your service for over a few years now, and the tech service has been great helping me before I knew a whole lot about hosting. I've never had any problems with service. I also use Hostwind with VPS because of an adult website that I own, so I can see a difference.
Our website was always up and incase we had any problems they were resolved promptly. Employees are very knowledgeable and go above an beyond to help you.

We've been with them 10 years!Always expert service, professional, and solves all our problems quickly. Ove the last ten years I've probably called maybe 3x a year for various things, but they always make things right. Highly recommend.

Review.Titre: Best hosting company we have found in three decades.
Review.Contenu: We have been on the internet since 1994, and have had only four hosting companies. Inmotionhosting.com has been our hosting company for over six years, and they are by far the best hosting company we have dealt with. Their tech people always get the problem fixed in record time. We highly recommend them.

Review.Titre: Best company I have ever used
Review.Contenu: Best company I have ever used. Been with them for many years with zero complaints. I have used other companies not even close to the customer service thst Inmotion hosting gives. I have been in internet business since 1995. You will not be disappointed.

Review.Titre: i AM VERY IMPRESSED WITH THE COMPANY…
Review.Contenu: i AM VERY IMPRESSED WITH THE COMPANY LEADERSHIP, reflected by excellent support of your technical support and system administrators.I can go on and on. Your service is invaluable to the small guys like us on the rise! Particularly, on UOhnit.com. You help to make it possible for us to contend on a global scale. I honor, respect and love you guys. Review.Titre: We have used InMotion hosting for 10…
Review.Contenu: We have used InMotion hosting for 10 years. We started on their VPS server plan and moved up to dedicated. We've hosted about 100 websites with them over that time. We've literally tried every big hosting company in the US for the 10 years before InMotion. Once we got to InMotion, there were absolutely no errors with any of our servers. We also ran about 30 websites on AWS on a Linux environment for people that requested to be on AWS. Within about 6 months of this, all of the sites disappeared one day. The next day, on a different location of servers, another client's website disappeared. We running another instance for him on his own account. And 2 days later, another one, on a server in Europe. Must have been some updates to the server by said company, which we had nothing to do with. Fortunately we had backups for everyone, and quickly got them back up and running. And after that, we migrated them to InMotion, all of them. But the moral of that story is the grass ain't greener on the other side. And some companies don't accept responsibility, which is unbelievable. InMotion takes care of us almost every day. I manage other clients on their servers. They run their own dedicated managed servers, so i can chat with InMotion and take care of anything. Usually, it's security related - some hackers or DDoS attacks. They get on chat quickly and they are always resolving any problems. The server admins really know their stuff. I know they do because I've had some bad ones from other companies over the years. These guys have been great. We wouldn't have used them for the last 10 years if they weren't.
